projects.title: BC Ferry Times
projects.description: Get real time information for your next BC Ferries voyage with Ferry Times! Know exactly when, where, and how full your next trip will be at the tap of a finger! This app tracks real time data from every major ferry terminal in British Columbia.

projects.title: Ferry Watch
projects.description: Ferry Watch is the ultimate companion app for anyone who travels by ferry in British Columbia or Washington state. With real-time tracking of all ferries in the region, you'll never miss a sailing or wonder how long you have to wait for the next one.
